dashboard.description:
# Boot & Logon
The performance is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Number of days since last reboot** If the number of days since last reboot is: • More than 14 days ➔ 0 • 10-14d ➔ 3 to 0 • 7-10d ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-7d ➔ 10 to 7 * **Logon duration** If average logon duration is: • More than 60 seconds ➔ 0 • 30-60s ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-30s ➔ 10 to 7 * **Extended logon duration** If average extended logon duration is: • More than 360 seconds ➔ 0 • 120-360s ➔ 3 to 0 • 42-120s ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-42s ➔ 10 to 7
dashboard.name: Boot & Logon

metric.label: L2 - Boot & Logon score by device type
L2 - Boot & Logon score by model
L2 - Boot & Logon score by OS
L2 - Boot & Logon score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Hardware checklist
The hardware checklist is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Disk health** If S.M.A.R.T index is: • 0-79% ➔ 0 • 80-99% ➔ 5 • 100% ➔ 10 • unknown ➔ "-" * **System drive free space** If system drive free space is: • 0-5GB ➔ 0 • 5-20GB ➔ 3 to 7 • 20GB or more ➔ 7 to 10 • unknown ➔ "-"
dashboard.name: Hardware

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Hardware score by device type
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Hardware score by model
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Hardware score by OS
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Hardware score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Infrastructure checklist
The infrastructure checklist is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Network connectivity** If the successful connection ratio for the last 7 days is: • 95-0% ➔ 3 to 0 • 98-95% ➔ 7 to 3 • 100-98% ➔ 10 to 7 • unknown ➔ "-" * **Network response time** If antivirus RTP is: • 150ms or more ➔ 0 • 80-150ms ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-80ms ➔ 10 to 7 • unknown ➔ "-"
dashboard.name: Infrastructure

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Infrastructure score by device type
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Infrastructure score by model
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Infrastructure score by OS
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Infrastructure score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Level 2: Proactive improvement
This module provides device performance metrics. These allow you to quickly spot areas of improvement and take action.
The **trends** help you follow the evolution of the performance scores and check if the overall performance is improving or regressing.
Proactively ensuring that devices meet the requirements of the Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist can help to reduce the number of incidents, which will in turn reduce the workload on the Support team.
This helps Support agents to quickly spot issues and troubleshoot the most common incidents, potentially reducing the number of tickets that are escalated to L2 support. Furthermore, ensuring that endpoints meet the requirements can help avoid L2 support losing time when tickets are escalated.
# Overview Starting from the **overview** dashboard, you can compare the Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist **by location**, **device model**, **OS** and **device type**.
The **details** widget shows which areas (e.g. hardware or software) require more attention.
The **trends** help you follow the evolution of the averages for individual scores and check if more or fewer devices are meeting the Level 2: Proactive improvement requirements.
# Level 2: Proactive improvement scores The Level 2: Proactive improvement score is the average of 8 sub-scores: * **Hardware:** Disk health, system drive free space * **Software:** OS up-to-date, WMI, browser * **Security:** Antivirus, firewall * **Boot & Logon:** Days since last reboot, Logon duration, Extended Logon duration * **Performance:** CPU usage, memory usage * **Stability:** BSODs, Hard resets * **Software stability:** Software crashes, software freezes * **Infrastructure:** Network connectivity, network response time
dashboard.name: Overview

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist score by device type
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist score by model
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist score by OS
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Performance
The performance is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **CPU usage** If overall high CPU time ratio is: • 30-100% ➔ 0 • 20-30% ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-20% ➔ 10 to 7 * **Memory usage** If overall high memory time ratio is: • 40-100% ➔ 0 • 20-40% ➔ 7 to 3 • 0-20% ➔ 10 to 7
dashboard.name: Performance

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Performance score by device type
L2 - Performance score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Security checklist
The security checklist is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Corporate antivirus** Is corporate antivirus is: • No ➔ 0 • Yes ➔ 10 * **Antivirus RTP status** If antivirus RTP (real-time protection) is: • Disabled or unknown status ➔ 0 • Enabled ➔ 10 * **Antivirus update status** If antivirus is: • Not up-to-date or unknown ➔ 0 • Up-to-date ➔ 10 * **Corporate firewall** Is corporate firewall is: • No ➔ 0 • Yes ➔ 10 * **Firewall RTP status** If firewall RTP (real-time protection) is: • Disabled or unknown status ➔ 0 • Enabled ➔ 10
dashboard.name: Security

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Security score by device type
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Security score by model
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Security score by OS
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Security score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Software checklist
The software checklist is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **OS update status** If OS was last updated: • More than four weeks ago ➔ 0 • Three to four weeks ago ➔ 3 • Two to three weeks ago ➔ 5 • One to two weeks ago ➔ 7 • In the past week ➔ 10 * **Corporate browser** If: • Non-corporate browser used ➔ 0 • Only corporate browser used ➔ 10 * **WMI** If the WMI status is: • failure ➔ 0 • ok ➔ 10
dashboard.name: Software

metric.label: Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Software score by device type
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Software score by model
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Software score by OS
Level 2: Proactive improvement checklist / Software score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Software stability
The performance is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Software crashes** If the number of application crashes last 7 days is: • More than 5 ➔ 0 • 3-5 ➔ 3 to 0 • 1-3 ➔ 7 to 3 • 0 ➔ 10 * **Software freezes** If the number of application freezes last 7 days is: • More than 5 ➔ 0 • 3-5 ➔ 3 to 0 • 1-3 ➔ 7 to 3 • 0 ➔ 10
dashboard.name: Software stability

metric.label: L2 - Software stability score by device type
L2 - Software stability score by model
L2 - Software stability score by OS
L2 - Software stability score by device type

dashboard.description:
# Stability
The performance is composed of the average of the following sub-scores: * **Hard resets** If overall number of hard resets is: • More than 3 ➔ 0 • 3 ➔ 3 • 2 ➔ 5 • 1 ➔ 7 • 0 ➔ 10 * **BSODs** If overall number of Blue Screens Of Death is: • More than 3 ➔ 0 • 3 ➔ 3 • 2 ➔ 5 • 1 ➔ 7 • 0 ➔ 10
dashboard.name: Stability

metric.label: L2 - Stability score by device type
L2 - Stability score by device type
